1.label: Parameter 1
1.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current pm2.5 value when change > n * 1ug/m3

2.label: Parameter 2
2.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current co2 value when change > n * 5ppm

3.label: Parameter 3
3.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current temperature value when change > n * 0.5℃

4.label: Parameter 4
4.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current humidity value when change >n%

5.label: Parameter 5
5.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1-127*5ppb report change

6.label: Parameter 6
6.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current illumination value when change >n*1 lux

7.label: Parameter 7
7.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value>=1 indicates to report current noise value when change >n*1 db

8.label: Parameter 8
8.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value=1 indicates report change

9.label: Parameter 9
9.description: Value=0 indicates turn off report , value=1 indicates report change

metadata.inclusion: Activate Add mode in the gateway. When device is powered on, hold F1 to choose interface for Add Z-Wave network. Click F2 five times until double curved arrow icon turns blue.  Hold F2 and the device enters into learning mode, then Wifi icon turns blue and the device is added into Z-Wave network
metadata.exclusion: Activate Remove mode in the gateway. When device is powered on, hold F1 to choose interface for Remove Z-Wave network. Click F2 five times until double curved arrow icon turns blue. Hold F2 and the device enters into learning mode, then Wifi icon turns blue and the device is removed from Z-Wave network
